{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Source[source]

Source()

All sources should implement this class.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Source.preload[source]

Source.preload(root_dir:str)

Some sources require loading extra data to process.

Source.get_files[source]

Source.get_files(root_dir:str)

List of paths and files to process, as returned by get_audio_filenames.

Source.get_category[source]

Source.get_category(path:str, filename:str)

Category name for the given file (most sources hardcode a single category).

Source.get_labels[source]

Source.get_labels(path:str, filename:str)

List of labels for the given file.

Source.get_extra[source]

Source.get_extra(path:str, filename:str)

(Optional) Extra information for the given file.

{% endraw %}

Useful functions to process the filenames

{% raw %}

normalise_label[source]

normalise_label(label:str)

Normalise a label to be used in the metadata (process should call this automatically).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

normalise_all_labels[source]

normalise_all_labels(labels:list[str])

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_footstep_type[source]

get_footstep_type(filename:str)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Some other useful functions

{% raw %}

get_filenames[source]

get_filenames(root_dir:str, extensions:str)

List (path, filename) in the directory.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_audio_filenames[source]

get_audio_filenames(root_dir:str)

List (path, audio filename) in the directory.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

remove_extension[source]

remove_extension(filename:str)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_hash[source]

get_hash(file_path:str)

Get the xxhash64 hash of the file.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Processing Sources

For the most part, implementing the interface above should be enough to call process.

{% raw %}

process[source]

process(source:Source, data_dir:str, version:int)

Process source and return the metadata.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
